description:
Why should you take this course?

Get your message across to people who don't think they need to hear it. During this 30 minute course, Jason Teteak will show you how to speak effectively the FIRST time you record a video or podcast so that your audience actually watches it all the way to the end.

So many podcasts can be boring or "pitchy"...

Do you like to listen to the boring elevator pitches of other people? Of course not. So, why would others want to hear yours?

What WILL help you is to ensure that you have a true value proposition that's interesting, provocative, and shows your audience what's in it for them.

You'll learn 20 different speaking techniques that will get you more positive feedback and sharing of your next video or podcast.
title: DIY For Entrepreneurs: Record Videos With Confidence
